title: The first problem is call limits. The second problem is regarding the internet.
content:
Hi actually I have 2 problem with this phone app. The first problem is call limits. The second problem is regarding the internet.

1. The first problem is call limits.

I have a problem with the call limit time. when I am making a call for up to 2 hours the call will end on its own. exactly in 2 hours. The question is how to remove the call time limit? Is there have a solution I need to do(setting)? I hope to solve this problem as soon as possible. 

2. The second problem is regarding the internet.

When I am making a call, internet data will not work. I cannot use the internet when making phone calls. what is the solution? I hope I can solve this problem as soon as possible. Thank you.
